name: Super Box Dropper
description:
I built this using Clickteam Fusion 2.5. It's based on the physics tutorial included with Fusion. I added a few elements, namely my own (bad) art, a score tracker, and a win state.

You could actually call it a game. You *could*.

I (quite obviously) have next to zero programming experience. That said, I'm pretty happy I managed to create this over lunch. Highly recommended tool for people that want to make some games but don't know where to start.

Oh, and don't click outside the game window. It will freeze. The only way to restart if that happens is to refresh. Have fun :)
